user@localhost:~/test$ singularity storage create s3 aws --region us-east-1 name bucket
ID  Name  Type  Path    
1   name  s3    bucket  

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose storage create s3 aws --region us-east-1 name bucket
ID  Name  CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            Type  Path    Config            
1   name  2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  s3    bucket  region:us-east-1
